name: EL_EXPRESSION
documentation: Abstract parent of all typed expression meta-types.

eval_type.name: eval_type
eval_type.documentation:
Meta-type of expression entity used in type-checking and evaluation. 

Effected in descendants.

is_boolean.name: is_boolean
is_boolean.documentation: True if `_eval_type_` is notionally Boolean (i.e. a `BMM_SIMPLE_TYPE` with `_type_name()_` = `Boolean`).
